pos_mean_info_list.mean: [计] 主机；主人；主持人；许多

word_group.brief_definition: 可能招惹麻烦(或担忧)的东西(或许诺)；造成后患的事物
劫持人质者；扣押人质者；人质挟持者
人质事件；劫持人质事件
人质救援小组；人质救援队

bilingual.source: The police successfully rescued the kidnapped hostage.
bilingual.target: 警察成功解救了被绑架的人质。

bilingual.source: The hostage was finally freed after a tense standoff.
bilingual.target: 在紧张的对峙后，人质终于被释放了。
谈判专家成功解除武装了劫持人质者。

bilingual.source: The hostage showed remarkable courage during the ordeal.
bilingual.target: 人质在这次磨难中表现出了非凡的勇气。

bilingual.source: They used the hostage as a bargaining chip in the negotiations.
bilingual.target: 他们用人质作为谈判的筹码。

bilingual.source: The captor demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.
bilingual.target: 俘虏者要求支付赎金以释放人质。

bilingual.source: The police negotiated for hours to secure the release of the hostage.
bilingual.target: 警方谈判了数小时以确保人质的释放。

bilingual.source: The hostage was finally released after being held captive for several days.
bilingual.target: 那名人质在被关押了几天后终于获释。

bilingual.source: The government refused to negotiate with the terrorists holding the hostage.
bilingual.target: 政府拒绝与劫持人质的恐怖分子谈判。

bilingual.source: The kidnappers took a hostage to ensure their demands were met.
bilingual.target: 绑匪劫持了一名人质以确保他们的要求得到满足。

yingyinNormal.en: Ten seconds, starting now. Five seconds. End the call. One hostage. All three. One.
yingyinNormal.zh: 10秒钟，现在开始，5秒钟，结束通话。一个人质。三个。一个。

yingyinNormal.en: You are not the captain? No,no. You're the captain. Pike was taken hostage. By Nero?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不是舰长吗？不不，你才是舰长。派克被抓去当人质了。被尼诺抓走了？

yingyinNormal.en: One hostage does not outweigh the threat to millions. I'm sorry, but this changes nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 区区一个人质相比较数万人的生命来说，无足轻重，对不起，但这改变不了什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Then she was taken hostage in that coup. I couldn't believe my luck! That bought me a little time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 结果她在那次政变里被押作人质。我都不敢相信自己这么幸运！那给了我一点时间。

yingyinNormal.en: And now your whole life's a hostage situation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在你整个人生都被劫持了。

yingyinNormal.en: Why, OPEC was trying to hold us hostage then just as Russia's trying to hold us hostage now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 石油输出国家组织当时想要挟我们，就像今天俄罗斯也想故技重施。

yingyinNormal.en: Not to play with, they were used as decoys in case of a hostage situation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过不是拿来玩，是拿来当我的替身，以防我被劫持嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: What you didn't know, Mary, was that this one also tipped off the hostage-takers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不知道的是，玛丽，此人还警告了劫持者。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe she was trying to send you a message. You think? Yeah. This man is not my father. I'm being held hostage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许这是暗示。真的吗？是啊，暗示"这个男的不是我爸爸，我被挟持了。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. That's a lot. Yeah, not enough. It's so frustrating that science should be held hostage to the almighty dollar.
yingyinNormal.zh: 已经很多了。还远远不够。真是闹心科学竟然沦落为金钱的奴隶。

yingyinNormal.en: Army Captain Craig Squire had been captured by the Taliban, held hostage in the Kandahar province. We realized the intel was bad. By the time we found him, we'd started taking fire. It was like a death garden or something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 塔利班劫持了陆军上尉克雷格·斯夸尔，他被关在坎大哈省。我们发现情报有误。我们找到他 就开始交火。那里就像是死亡花园。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
